name: IMTextified
overview:
We allow people to connect with their friends across different nextrowks mainly SMS, IM, and email.

Do you want to chat with your friends on GTalk but don’t have a data plan? Use our service to intiate a conversation with your friend through your phone using SMS on GTalk, Yahoo, MSN, AIM, etc.

You can also use our service to send an email from your phone through your own email address but don’t have a data plan? We can help! You can now send an email from the address of your choice write through your phone using SMS.

How about sending an SMS through email? Don’t want to use that tiny keaybord? We have got you covered. Write your message as normal. Address your email to friend-cell-phone-number@sms.imtextified.com. Remember to add 1 and the area code. If your friend’s phone number is (999)888-1111. Then, the email address would be 19998881111@sms.imtextified.com. Hit send! Viola! Then, your friend can respond to the text and it will come right back in to your email inbox.
